alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 3:13AM EST until January 05 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches for a storm total of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Central Piscataquis and Southern Piscataquis Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
